last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 3: Japanese Buddhism - Volcanoes.
last_episode_to_air.overview: Joanna visits a selection of temples to better understand Japanese Buddhism, stays in the world's first robot hotel and gets an aerial view of one of Japan's most active volcanoes.

name: Joanna Lumley's Japan
overview: The British actress goes on a 2,000 mile journey across the four main islands of Japan, travelling from North to South meeting local people and absorbing the culture.

episodes.name: Episode 1: Sapporo - Fukushima - Bullet Train
episodes.overview: Joanna Lumley journeys across Japan. She visits the city of Sapporo during the annual Snow Festival, visits the Fukushima exclusion zone and takes a 'bullet train' to Tokyo.

episodes.name: Episode 2: Tokyo - Kyoto - Cherry Blossom.
episodes.overview: Joanna flies over the city of Tokyo in a helicopter, walks the Nakasendo Way that once linked Tokyo to Kyoto, and arrives in Kyoto at the peak of the cherry blossom season.

episodes.name: Episode 3: Japanese Buddhism - Volcanoes.
episodes.overview: Joanna visits a selection of temples to better understand Japanese Buddhism, stays in the world's first robot hotel and gets an aerial view of one of Japan's most active volcanoes.
